infractions.Violation Summary: Camp health program not maintained and/or supervised by physician Health records of campers and staff are not kept and maintained plan is not comprehensive and complete nutrition emergency and first aid plan accident reporting disaster search and rescue child observation food and facility maintenance not included
infractions.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations
